title: Hearty and warming lentil soup
ingredients: ['3 tablespoons light olive oil', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 cloves of crushed garlic', '1 small chunk of fresh ginger, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '600ml (1 pt) vegetable stock', '200g red split lentils', 'salt and black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon oregano', '1 bay leaf']
